feature_model.name: CFDP Library

meta.data: Feature Model of the CFDP library
PReCISE Research Centre, Faculty of Computer Science, University of Namur
Arnaud Hubaux, Andreas Classen and Patrick Heymans, Formal Modelling of Feature Configuration Workflows, SPLC 2009, San Francisco, USA.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r CFDP_Library(CFDP_Library) :g (_r_1) [1,*] : Send(Send) :o Send_Acknowledged_Mode(Send_Acknowledged_Mode) :o Send_File_System_Operations(Send_File_System_Operations) : Receive(Receive) :o Receive_Acknowledged_Mode(Receive_Acknowledged_Mode) :o Receive_File_System_Operations(Receive_File_System_Operations) : PUS_(PUS_) :o PUS_Rename(PUS_Rename) :o PUS_Copy(PUS_Copy) : Reboot_(Reboot_) :o Reboot_Entity(Reboot_Entity) :o Reboot_PUS(Reboot_PUS)
